MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD6 postcode area of Melrose. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.44am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to grounded overhead lines near Faldonside House and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.29pm on Thursday 14th January 2021.
